markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 37 **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 37 **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 37 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 [Ixamè](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1682) **Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 22 **Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), mist vision, [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet **Languages** [Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +18, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16 **Str** +7 **Dex** +2 **Con** +5 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +4 **Mist Vision** Fog and mist don't impair a cloud dragon's vision; Ixamè ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from fog and mist. --- **AC** 30 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +18 **Will** +20 **HP** 175 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 26
**Deflecting Cloud** **Trigger** Ixamè is the target of a ranged attack; **Requirements** Ixamè is aware of the attack and has a free wing; **Effect** Ixamè rapidly flexes one of her wings and creates a billowing cloud of mist. She is treated as if she were [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) for the purposes of resolving the triggering attack, so normally the attacker must succeed at a DC 11 flat check to target her. Ixamè also gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 40 feet, fly 140 feet; cloud walk **Melee** jaws +23 ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+13 piercing plus 1d12 poison **Melee** claw +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d8+13 slashing **Melee** tail +21 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d12+13 bludgeoning **Melee** horn +21 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d12+11 piercing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 29 - **1st** [Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143) (at will) - **2nd** [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210) **Breath Weapon** ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Ixamè breathes a cloud of poison like that emitted from Terwa Lake that deals 11d6 poison damage in a 40- foot cone (DC 29 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). She can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Cloud Walk** Ixamè can tread on clouds or fog as though on solid ground. **Draconic Frenzy** Ixamè makes two claw Strikes and one horn Strike in any order. **Draconic Momentum** Ixamè recharges her Breath Weapon whenever she scores a critical hit when making a Strike.
name: Ixamè

text: Ixamè Recall Knowledge - Dragon (Arcana): DC 37 Recall Knowledge - Elemental (Arcana, Nature): DC 37 Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 37 Unspecific Lore : DC 35 Specific Lore : DC 32 Ixamè Source Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl pg. 22 Perception +22; darkvision, mist vision, scent (imprecise) 60 feet Languages Auran, Common, Draconic Skills Acrobatics +20, Athletics +21, Deception +20, Diplomacy +18, Intimidation +22, Nature +18, Stealth +18, Survival +16 Str +7 Dex +2 Con +5 Int +2 Wis +4 Cha +4 Mist Vision Fog and mist don't impair a cloud dragon's vision; Ixamè ignores the concealed condition from fog and mist. --- AC 30 Fort +21 Ref +18 Will +20 HP 175 (negative healing) Immunities electricity, paralyzed, poison, sleep Frightful Presence (aura, emotion, fear, mental) 90 feet, DC 26 Deflecting Cloud Reaction Trigger Ixamè is the target of a ranged attack; Requirements Ixamè is aware of the attack and has a free wing; Effect Ixamè rapidly flexes one of her wings and creates a billowing cloud of mist. She is treated as if she were hidden for the purposes of resolving the triggering attack, so normally the attacker must succeed at a DC 11 flat check to target her. Ixamè also gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- Speed 40 feet, fly 140 feet; cloud walk Melee Single Action jaws +23 (Poison, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+13 piercing plus 1d12 poison Melee Single Action claw +23 (Agile), Damage 2d8+13 slashing Melee Single Action tail +21 (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d12+13 bludgeoning Melee Single Action horn +21 (deadly d8, reach 10 feet), Damage 1d12+11 piercing Primal Innate Spells DC 29 - 1st Gust of Wind (at will) - 2nd Obscuring Mist Breath Weapon Two Actions (Evocation, Poison, Primal) Ixamè breathes a cloud of poison like that emitted from Terwa Lake that deals 11d6 poison damage in a 40- foot cone (DC 29 basic Reflex save). She can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. Cloud Walk Ixamè can tread on clouds or fog as though on solid ground. Draconic Frenzy Two Actions Ixamè makes two claw Strikes and one horn Strike in any order. Draconic Momentum Ixamè recharges her Breath Weapon whenever she scores a critical hit when making a Strike.
